CustomField.formula: HYPERLINK( "/lightning/cmp/c__ERPOrderLineDashboard?c__orderNbr=" & Order_Nbr_with_Country_Code__c &"&c__orderType=" & Related_Order__r.Backlog_Orders_Status__c &"&c__orderId=" & Order_Id__c &"&c__source=CADD" &"&c__acctN=" & Account_Name__c , Order_number__c , "_blank" )
CustomField.label: Order Number
